summary: The story of how a few individuals built an industry that would go on to finance nearly all of the major advancements in technology in the past 50 years with companies such as Atari, Genentech, Apple, Intel and more.
cast: Bill Bowes|Herbert Boyer|Po Bronson|Nolan Bushnell|Reid Dennis|Bill Draper|Bill Edwards|Pitch Johnson|Dick Kramlich|Sandy Lerner|Mike Markkula|Gordon Moore|Tom Perkins|Arthur Rock|Jimmy Treybig|Don Valentine
title: Something Ventured
